actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to establish a system to retain gasoline and diesel fuel among civilian users in order to provide for sufficient fuel for farm use in areas of shortage.

summary.text: Directs the President to establish and implement a plan to ration gasoline and diesel fuel among civilian users in order to provide for sufficient fuel for essential farm operations in areas of shortage.

titles.title: A bill to establish a system to retain gasoline and diesel fuel among civilian users in order to provide for sufficient fuel for farm use in areas of shortage.
